targets.query: SELECT difference(last("fielddata_tripped")) FROM "elasticsearch_breakers" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND "node_name" =~ /^$node_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("request_tripped")) FROM "elasticsearch_breakers" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND "node_name" =~ /^$node_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("parent_tripped")) FROM "elasticsearch_breakers" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND "node_name" =~ /^$node_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("gc_collectors_old_collection_count")) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT difference(last("gc_collectors_old_collection_time_in_millis")) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT difference(last("gc_collectors_old_collection_count")) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)

SELECT difference(last("gc_collectors_old_collection_time_in_millis")) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND "node_name" =~ /^$node_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT difference(last("gc_collectors_young_collection_count")) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT difference(last("gc_collectors_young_collection_time_in_millis")) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT difference(last("gc_collectors_young_collection_count")) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)

SELECT difference(last("gc_collectors_young_collection_time_in_millis")) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND "node_name" =~ /^$node_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT sum("fielddata_evictions") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(0)
SELECT sum("fielddata_evictions") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND "node_name" =~ /^$node_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT sum("fielddata_evictions") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE "cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND "node_name" =~ /^$node_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: Cluster name
list.name: cluster_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WITH KEY = "cluster_name"

list.name: node_name
